title: Business Website
tagline: Modern, responsive websites to grow your brand
details: Full site build with modern design, CMS setup for easy content management, SEO basics to get found online, mobile responsive, and 1-month support to ensure smooth operation.

title: E-Commerce Store
tagline: Start selling online with a professional shop
details: Complete online store with secure payment integration, inventory management, order tracking, customer accounts, and responsive design.

title: Web Application
tagline: Custom web apps tailored to your needs
details: Build powerful web applications with custom functionality, user authentication, database integration, and API development.

title: Brand Identity Package
details: Logo design, business card, letterhead, social media templates, brand guidelines, and color palette.

title: Social Media Graphics
tagline: Engaging visuals for your social channels
details: Custom graphics for Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Twitter. Monthly packages available.

title: Web Design Fundamentals
details: 8-week course covering HTML, CSS, responsive design, and modern frameworks. Includes live sessions and project feedback.

title: Digital Strategy Session
tagline: Expert guidance for your digital growth
details: One-on-one consultation for website strategy, SEO, social media, and digital marketing planning.

title: Technical Support
tagline: Ongoing support for your digital presence
details: Monthly retainer for website updates, bug fixes, content updates, and technical support.
